import styles from './HomePage.module.scss'; import flowerOne from '../../assets/images/img_illustration_flower_one.png'; import flowerTwo from '../../assets/images/img_illustration_flower_two.png'; import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import SpecialOffer from "../specialOffer/SpecialOffer"; import Customers from "./customers/Customers"; import AboutLaFlora from "./aboutLaFlora/AboutLaFlora"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; const HomePage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const categories = useSelector(state => state.FilteredProducts); const products = useSelector(state => state.products); return (
3-Hour Delivery

Elegant Bouquets,
Locally Crafted in LA

New Arrivals

{ products.filter((product) => product.categories === 4).map((product, index) => (

{product.title}

)) }

Client’s Choice

On Sale

) } export default HomePage;
